file_insights.project_structure: Created complete Vite + React + TypeScript frontend application with proper configuration files and source code structure

patterns_discovered.modular_architecture: Split TypeScript configurations for app vs node, following Vite best practices
patterns_discovered.proxy_configuration: Vite server proxy configured for API endpoints to backend at localhost:8000
patterns_discovered.port_management: Frontend explicitly configured to run on port 3001 to avoid conflicts
patterns_discovered.environment_variables: Environment variables properly typed for Vite and Keycloak integration
patterns_discovered.eslint_configuration: Modern ESLint setup with React and TypeScript rules for code quality
patterns_discovered.path_aliases: Configured @/* alias for cleaner imports in source code

gotchas_discovered.typescript_configuration: Multiple tsconfig files needed for different contexts (app, node, root)
gotchas_discovered.port_conflict_prevention: Explicit port configuration (3001) to avoid conflicts with backend (8000)
gotchas_discovered.proxy_setup: API proxy correctly configured to maintain authentication cookies
gotchas_discovered.environment_type_safety: Environment variables properly typed in vite-env.d.ts

success_metrics.subtask_completed: subtask-2-1 - Create frontend directory structure and initialize Vite React project
success_metrics.build_verification: Vite dev server can be started and accessed successfully
success_metrics.structure_readiness: Project ready for next subtask (Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui installation)

approach_outcome.efficiency: Clean, modern setup following Vite + React + TypeScript best practices
approach_outcome.scalability: Proper TypeScript configuration and path aliases support future growth

next_steps.immediate: Install Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui for component library
next_steps.long_term: Build ordering interface components with real API integration

optimizations.developer_experience: Add hot module replacement configuration for development
optimizations.performance: Consider code splitting strategies for large component libraries
optimizations.testing: Add Vitest configuration for unit testing
